text: Gastón Revol (born November 26, 1986) is an Argentine rugby union player. He plays rugby sevens for . He debuted at the 2009 London Sevens. Revol captained at the 2016 Summer Olympics. == References == == External links == * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine rugby union players Category:Argentine people of French descent Category:Argentina international rugby sevens players Category:Male rugby sevens players Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Argentina Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in rugby sevens Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Argentina Category:World Games silver medalists Category:Competitors at the 2013 World Games Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2015 Pan American Games
title: Gastón Revol
